## Protocol.DOMSnapshot.DOMNode.childNodeIndexes property

The indexes of the node's child nodes in the `domNodes` array returned by `getSnapshot`<!-- -->, if any.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
childNodeIndexes?: integer[];
```
